posts.content:
For Sale!!

T1 Panel 1959 Matching numbers bus with handpainted logo's
and working semaphores!!

This absolute gorgeous splitwindow panel is a
first class TOP restoration, really every bold has been renewed!

The original 6v engine (#3416606) 1.2L 30Hp 22kw is running unbelievable
smoothly!!

The interior is NEW!!

This splitwindow panel is in really Excellent condition!!
Official Inspection rapport is available!

Please have a look at the pictures and let them speak for itself!
More pictures and mp4 of the running engine available on request via email
and have a few on photobucket.

http://s172.photobucket.com/user/Zwikcl ... t=3&page=1

This 1959 splitwindow panel is really amazing!!
This is really a perfect investment!!!
Offers as from 70.000£ will be taken seriously
Trade in is possible but only a 50's 23 window Samba project!!
Do you still want a Awesome ride for Volksworld then this is the award winning car!

The car is located near Rotterdam Holland

We can ship worldwide as we have our own freight forwarding compagny!!!

Wow a 1959 LHD Panel Van, That's really rare that is

Would you take my 1954 RHD Doubledoor Panel Van in part exchange?

Sorry its not a 23w but if you don't ask v v v v

Hi
I think people are trying to tell you that this will not sale for the money you are looking for.
Panels do not go for this money this late or what ever the age
Have a look on google to find a ruff price and your have more chance of selling it.
But the price will have to come down a lot to tell the truth

good luck with sale mate
